ruleBookInfo.downloadUrls:
<js>
if(result.match(/mod\=attachment/)){	po=java.getString('.attnm@a@href',result)
let urls=getUrl()+po;
urls
	}else{
java.toast('\n正在购买，请稍候');
let aid=result.match(/aid\=(\d+)\&/)[1]||1;
let formhash=result.match(/formhash\=(.*?)\&/)[1]||1;
let tid=baseUrl.match(/tid\=(.*?)\&/)[1]||1;
let url=getUrl()+`forum.php?mod=misc&action=attachpay&tid=${tid},`;
let body = `formhash=${formhash}&referer=https://gdr.6d9g.b172gf1r5g.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=${tid}&highlight=%CF%B5%CD%B3&mobile=2&aid=${aid}&paysubmit=true`;
post = JSON.stringify(
    {
        "body": String(body),
        "method": "POST"
    })
url+=post
//java.log(url);
result=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(result)
if(result.match(/银币不足/)){
	java.toast('\n抱歉，银币不足')}else
if(result.match(/附件购买成功/)){
java.toast('\n购买成功，请刷新一下')
	}}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: h2@text

searchUrl:
<js>
let ck = source.getLoginHeader();
if (ck==null)
java.toast("\n❗未获取到登录信息，请登录再搜索❗")
let url = getUrl()+'search.php?mod=forum&mobile=2,';
let body = `srchtxt=${key}&searchsubmit=yes`;
java.put('key',key);
post = JSON.stringify(
    {
        "body": String(body),
        "method": "POST"
    })
url+=post
String(java.connect(url).raw().request().url()).replace(/kw\=.*\&/,'page={{page}}&')
</js>
